name: Kranita's Dungeon
description:
Kranita's Dungeon is a game i'm working on. I will relese the beta 1 soon. It's a platformer connected with a RPG. It will include 1 character, enemies and 1 level. At the end im gona try publishing it on steam. Stay tuned!

WARNING! APPLE USERS MIGHT NOT GET THE GAME WORKING PROPERLY

Screenshots:

Controls:

a d: left, right

space: jump

shift: sprint

ctrl: crouch

esc: menu
